Tăng tốc nhanh: adb shell settings put global window_animation_scale 0.5
adb shell settings put global transition_animation_scale 0.5
adb shell settings put global animator_duration_scale 0.5
Chế độ tiết kiệm pin: adb shell settings put global low_power 1
adb shell settings put global wifi_scan_always_enabled 0
adb shell settings put global bluetooth_on 0
Chế độ chơi game: adb shell settings put global window_animation_scale 0.0
adb shell settings put global transition_animation_scale 0.0
adb shell settings put global animator_duration_scale 0.0
adb shell settings put global low_power 0
adb shell settings put system screen_brightness 255
Chế độ hiển thị tốt nhất: adb shell settings put system font_scale 1.15
Khôi phục mặc định: adb shell settings put global window_animation_scale 1.0
adb shell settings put global transition_animation_scale 1.0
adb shell settings put global animator_duration_scale 1.0
adb shell settings put global low_power 0
adb shell settings put system font_scale 1.0
